title: Dow flat in spite of gains in shares of Walmart, Verizon Communications Inc.
text:
Shares of Walmart and Verizon Communications Inc. are posting positive gains Tuesday morning, propelling the Dow Jones Industrial Average into positive territory. Shares of Walmart WMT, +1.18% and Verizon Communications Inc. VZ, +1.19% have contributed to the blue-chip gauge's intraday rally, as the Dow DJIA, +0.13% was most recently trading 24 points, or 0.1%, higher. Walmart's shares have risen $1.39 (1.2%) while those of Verizon Communications Inc. have climbed $0.61 (1.0%), combining for an approximately 14-point boost for the Dow. Also contributing significantly to the gain are Procter & Gamble PG, +1.22%, Travelers TRV, +1.11%, and American Express AXP, +0.93%. A $1 move in any one of the 30 components of the benchmark equates to a 6.78-point swing.

Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights using data from Dow Jones and FactSet. See our market data terms of use.
